rdf:Description.dc:title: Every Trader Joe's Beer, Ranked by Great Divide's Head Brewer1`
rdf:Description.dc:description: Ethan Osborne, the head of Denver brewery Great Divide, blindly tasted all beers from Trader Joe's and ranked them
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: All beers were given to Ethan in a tasting glass without him seeing the label, and he was asked to rate them on two criteria: taste and whether or not he'd order another one. Is this 100% scientific? No. Is this 100% a great way to learn if you should buy one of TJ's beers over another? Of course. Bonus: all of these 29 beers cost $40.37 before tax -- you can stock up.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Beer
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Breslouer, Lee
